name: wikidata-entity-lookup
description: Find entities (people, places, organizations) in wikidata.
author: James Chartrand

scripts.browserify: mkdirp build && browserify test/development.js -o build/development.js --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch: mkdirp build && watchify test/development.js -o build/development.js --debug --verbose -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.test: mkdirp .nyc_output && npm run test:electron && npm run generate-coverage
scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mkdirp build && watchify test/browser.js -o build/development.js --debug --verbose -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ istanbul ] ]
scripts.test:browser: cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify test/browser.js | browser-run -p 2222 | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:electron: cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify test/browser.js | browser-run | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=test browserify test/browser.js | browser-run -b chrome | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet

hooks.pre-commit: npm run test && npm run check-coverage
